posts.post_content:
Looking for a common back Art Phelan to start my [URL="http://bailencards.com/stevens-collection/t206-cincinnati/"]T207 Cincinnati team set[/URL].

Lower grade with no paper loss or creases.

PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url] if you have anything available.

Steven

Hi Steven

Sadly there aren't any common backs for Phelan.  Only Broadleaf, Cycle, and the two "Anonymous" backs (Fac 3, Fac 25).

Have one that almost fits the bill, but there are a couple of tiny specks of paper loss on the back.  Pretty card none-the-less.  $175 if you're interested.
